PLAY.TITLE: The Life of Timon of Athens

PERSONAE.TITLE: Dramatis Personae
PERSONAE.PERSONA: VENTIDIUS, one of Timon's false friends.
Cupid and Amazons in the mask.
Other Lords, Senators, Officers, Soldiers, Banditti, and Attendants.

PLAY.SCNDESCR: SCENE Athens, and the neighbouring woods.

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE I. Athens. A hall in Timon's house.
SCENE.STAGEDIR:
Enter Poet, Painter, Jeweller, Merchant, and
others, at several doors
Enter certain Senators, and pass over

Trumpets sound. Enter TIMON, addressing himself
courteously to every suitor; a Messenger from
VENTIDIUS talking with him; LUCILIUS and other
servants following

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE II. A banqueting-room in Timon's house.
SCENE.STAGEDIR:
Hautboys playing loud music. A great banquet
served in; FLAVIUS and others attending; then enter
TIMON, ALCIBIADES, Lords, Senators, and VENTIDIUS.
Then comes, dropping, after all, APEMANTUS,
discontentedly, like himself

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TIMON
SPEECH.STAGEDIR: They all stand ceremoniously looking on TIMON

SCENE.STAGEDIR:
Music. Re-enter Cupid with a mask of Ladies
as Amazons, with lutes in their hands,
dancing and playing

The Lords rise from table, with much adoring of
TIMON; and to show their loves, each singles out an
Amazon, and all dance, men with women, a lofty
strain or two to the hautboys, and cease
Exeunt all but APEMANTUS and TIMON

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE I. A Senator's house.
SCENE.STAGEDIR: Enter Senator, with papers in his hand

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE II. The same. A hall in Timon's house.
SCENE.STAGEDIR: Enter FLAVIUS, with many bills in his hand
Enter CAPHIS, and the Servants of Isidore and Varro
Enter FLAMINIUS, SERVILIUS, and other Servants

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE I. A room in Lucullus' house.
SCENE.STAGEDIR: FLAMINIUS waiting. Enter a Servant to him

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE III. A room in Sempronius' house.
SCENE.STAGEDIR: Enter SEMPRONIUS, and a Servant of TIMON's

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE IV. The same. A hall in Timon's house.
SCENE.STAGEDIR:
Enter two Servants of Varro, and the Servant of
LUCIUS, meeting TITUS, HORTENSIUS, and other
Servants of TIMON's creditors, waiting his coming out
Enter FLAVIUS in a cloak, muffled
Enter TIMON, in a rage, FLAMINIUS following

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE V. The same. The senate-house. The Senate sitting.
SCENE VI. The same. A banqueting-room in Timon's house.
SCENE.STAGEDIR:
Music. Tables set out: Servants attending.
Enter divers Lords, Senators and others, at
several doors

The dishes are uncovered and seen to be full of
warm water

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TIMON
SPEECH.STAGEDIR: Throwing the water in their faces
Throws the dishes at them, and drives them out

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE I. Without the walls of Athens.
SCENE II. Athens. A room in Timon's house.
SCENE.STAGEDIR: Enter FLAVIUS, with two or three Servants

SPEECH.SPEAKER: FLAVIUS
SPEECH.STAGEDIR: Servants embrace, and part several ways

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE III. Woods and cave, near the seashore.
SCENE.STAGEDIR:
Enter ALCIBIADES, with drum and fife, in
warlike manner; PHRYNIA and TIMANDRA

Drum beats. Exeunt ALCIBIADES, PHRYNIA,
and TIMANDRA
Exit FLAVIUS. TIMON retires to his cave

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE I. The woods. Before Timon's cave.
SCENE.STAGEDIR:
Enter Poet and Painter; TIMON watching
them from his cave
TIMON comes from his cave, behind
Beats them out, and then retires to his cave

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE II. Before the walls of Athens.
SCENE.STAGEDIR: Enter two Senators and a Messenger

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE III. The woods. Timon's cave, and a rude tomb seen.
SCENE IV. Before the walls of Athens.
SCENE.STAGEDIR: Trumpets sound. Enter ALCIBIADES with his powers
The Senators descend, and open the gates
